LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_AntigrainWarhead.label: боєголовка з антиматерією
LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_EMP.label: ЕМІ снаряд
LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_Firefoam.label: снаряд з протипожежною піною
LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_HighExplosive.label: осколково-фугасний снаряд
LanguageData.Bullet_Shell_Incendiary.label: запальний снаряд
LanguageData.Shell_AntigrainWarhead.label: боєголовка з антиматерією
LanguageData.Shell_AntigrainWarhead.description: Ультра-технологічна боєголовка, що носить на собі зерно антиматерії. Як правило, використовується космічними кораблями або машинами утопічних світів, створює великий вибух і вогні навколо цілі. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Shell_EMP.label: EMP shell
LanguageData.Shell_EMP.description: A shell filled with batteries and antennas, for generating an electromagnetic pulse when detonated. Electromagnetic pulses temporarily disable electrical devices and mechanoids. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Shell_Firefoam.label: firefoam shell
LanguageData.Shell_Firefoam.description: A pressurized shell filled with fire-retardant foam. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Shell_HighExplosive.label: high-explosive shell
LanguageData.Shell_HighExplosive.description: A shell filled with high explosives. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Shell_Incendiary.label: incendiary shell
LanguageData.Shell_Incendiary.description: A shell filled with flammable gel and a small explosive charge. Starts fires when detonated. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.
